definition: A device used for illuminating outdoor areas during nighttime, typically found on roads, streets, or highways. It is commonly mounted on poles or structures and emits light to ensure visibility and safety for pedestrians and vehicles.

examples.german: Die Straßenlaterne leuchtet die ganze Nacht.
examples.english: The street lamp lights up the whole night.
The street lamp was just repaired.

examples.german: Ich habe meine Taschenlampe vergessen, aber die Straßenlaterne hilft mir beim Gehen.
examples.english: I forgot my flashlight, but the street lamp helps me to walk.

examples.german: Die Straßenlaterne spendet ein warmes Licht.
examples.english: The street lamp emits a warm light.
